author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Remember When Stocks Were Unstoppable? - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Three months ago, some investors believed a yearslong, record-shattering rally in U.S stocks could go on indefinitely. Then the reality of a pullback in global liquidity set in, unleashing a bout of market volatility that many now believe is here to stay. On Jan. 26, both the S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average soared Brent Climbs Back Toward $75 a Barrelâ€”Energy Journal Next Stocks to Watch: Facebook, Qualcomm, AT&T, Ford, GM, Chipotle, Visa, eBay, Amazon, PayPal, Southwest
